I totally like this game, It's been 12 hours and im enjoying every second of it. The only problem i have is the online services and Controls. i cant go in mycareer or something. but overall I give this 9/10 especially if you like playing offline or myleague. this game is smooth i like it

NBA 2K24 builds on the solid foundation of other nba 2k games, offering familiar gameplay with some improvements in mechanics and visuals. The new shooting mechanics take a little getting used to, but once mastered, they add depth and precision to the experience.

I played mostly in career mode, which continues to be engaging and rewarding. While my PC handles most games easily, 2K24 runs poorly on higher settings, so playing on low is necessary — not ideal, but manageable. Overall, the experience feels very similar to 2K22, and longtime fans will feel right at home.

Although the online servers are scheduled to close eventually, the single-player content alone makes it worth playing for NBA enthusiasts.

negative.review: The last game I played was 2k13. 2K24 is the same game with better graphics. The AI, animations, and mechanics are all so bad. Learning to play this game is just memorizing how the aforementioned things arbitrarily work. Basketball logic has no bearing here. The cinematic experience is fun, but it seems no one cares about making it feel like basketball. FIFA and Madden for example have made leaps and bounds at actually simulating the strategy and physics behind their sports in the last decade.

Can't even play 1 MyCareer Game without having to quit and save at least once because the sim until next appearence is so trash that it just gets stuck almost every time and you look at the players slowing down then stop completely on the court and nothing ever happens after. Real bad playing experience
bucks team is over ratted Giannis is glitched bad game not recommend
cash grab company
Need dual control
Super Lag
holy dogshit
sitt
Trash

I regret buying this game, there is no point to even try to win because even if you do excellent shots, it doesnt matter, the shots you make are just randomized 30% the ball will fall in the basket  70% the ball will be shot out of the basket for no reason, i didnt even mention the ads In the menu, what makes you think i spent 20$ so i can get one pair of shoes? also i think on steam it should say that you need a controller, because its almost unplayable with mouse & keyboard.

WTF, ALWAYS PLAYING MYLEAGUE, GREEN BAR SO BULLSHIT, EVEN IF U HIT INSIDE THE GREEN METER, IT ALWAYS MISSES, ALSO EVEN IN FREETHROW WHERE THERE IS NO OPPONENT TO CONSTEST OR WHAT, IS MISSES EVEN IF 100%, WTF 2K

the worst game I have ever played in my life everything is wrong about this game I do not recommend it is not worth even $1 
the graphics are very bad damn this game is not worth it.

Can't even play 1 MyCareer Game without having to quit and save at least once because the sim until next appearence is so trash that it just gets stuck almost every time and you look at the players slowing down then stop completely on the court and nothing ever happens after. Real bad playing experience

The last game I played was 2k13. 2K24 is the same game with better graphics. The AI, animations, and mechanics are all so bad. Learning to play this game is just memorizing how the aforementioned things arbitrarily work. Basketball logic has no bearing here. The cinematic experience is fun, but it seems no one cares about making it feel like basketball. FIFA and Madden for example have made leaps and bounds at actually simulating the strategy and physics behind their sports in the last decade.
Old-gen version without story mode, crossplay, or, in fact, people. They might as well close the servers now; nobody’s playing anyway. You’d be better off paying for hookers and cocaine.
it skips and jumps mostly unplayable
